title: 402. The Opioid Tragedy, Part 1: “We’ve Addicted an Entire Generation”
description: How pharma greed, government subsidies, and a push to make pain the “fifth vital sign” kicked off a crisis that costs $80 billion a year and has killed hundreds of thousands of Americans.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: How pharma greed, government subsidies, and a push to make pain the “fifth vital sign” kicked off a crisis that costs $80 billion a year and has killed hundreds of thousands of Americans.
